name: review
description: Multi-agent code review for PRs: parallel specialized reviewers → consolidation → PR feedback
description_long: Comprehensive code review workflow that dispatches specialized reviewer agents in parallel (code quality, correctness, C++ performance, Python performance, security), consolidates findings to remove duplicates and rank by severity, then posts structured feedback to the PR as overview and inline comments.
